title: Summer Equals Shaved Ice!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Umi-san, have you decided on which one you want?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-, I’m sorry, give me one more minute, I’ll decide right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu, no problem. Please take your time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Which one are you getting, Setsuna?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I was thinking of getting this strawberry milk one. When you think of shaved ice, strawberry comes to mind, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I get what you mean.... I was thinking of getting the strawberry one as well, but this green tea one with mochi balls seems good too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waaah, there’s a green tea one, huh? I didn’t realize! That does look delicious....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Doesn’t it!? That’s why I don’t know which one to pick....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Uuu, now I’m not sure either.... This mango one with mango pulp also looks good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh, there’s a mango one? Gah, I can’t believe there are more choices now.... They all look delicious, I can’t choose~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
